title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/20
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/28/20
description:
George Noory and author William Forstchen explore his efforts to protect the nation's power grid and technology from destruction from a nuclear attack from a rogue nation or solar flares from the sun, which could cause major destruction and chaos.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
